content: Great article Ravi Raman.All the points mentioned by you do lead to a better more balanced life. One more point which I found to be very effective is to cultivate a feeling of gratitude and appreciation .Every day appreciate somebody around you.It can be your paper boy,the security guard or even the janitor in the office for something they did good. The feeling of appreciation is infectious and the good vibes it brings along with it keep the full day happy and vibrant.
